scripts.docker:dang: if [ ! -z "$(docker images -f "dangling=true"  -q)" ]; then docker rmi -f $(docker images -f "dangling=true"  -q); fi
scripts.docker:rmi: if [ ! -z "$(docker images -f "reference=todo-server*"  -q)" ]; then docker rmi -f $(docker images -f "reference=todo-server*"  -q); fi
scripts.docker:clean: yarn docker:dev:down && yarn docker:rmi && yarn docker:dang
